subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Four minutes into the third period, the Devils appeared to take the lead after a scramble, but replays showed Zach Parise swept the puck past Jonathan Quick with his glove.
snippet: Four minutes into the third period, the Devils appeared to take the lead after a scramble, but replays showed Zach Parise swept the puck past Jonathan Quick with his glove.
